group_1.narration: As my fusion with the Rumor progressed,@I lost the ability to make clear judgments, and I@was eliminating obstacles as guided by the Magius.
The Magius succeeded in bringing Walpurgisnacht to Kamihama@and their plan to liberate Magical Girls was going well.
But...right around that time...@Other Magical Girls appeared to disrupt the Magius' plans.
Among them were Kaname-san and the others...@So I...
